thread.section_title: Nelson Alexander Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nelson Alexander | www.nelsonalexander.com.au | 2 of 25
thread.title: Michelle Reynen
thread.title_full: Nelson Alexander reviewed by Michelle Reynen

author: Michelle Reynen
title: Michelle Reynen
text:
Mark Verrocchi and Hsiu from Nelson Alexander were a pleasure to deal with during the sale of our home.
Nothing was to much trouble. We were constantly updated with the progress of the campaign. Both Phill and I
felt completely at ease with the sale of our home in Mark's hands. At all times we were treated with consideration
and understanding.
We highly recommend Mark and Hsiu to anyone who is considering selling their property.
